text: The Wastrel () is a 1961 Italian Cypriot drama movie directed by Michael Cacoyannis and starring Ellie Lambeti, Van Heflin, Franco Fabrizi, Fosco Giachetti, Annie Gorassini, Clelia Matania. == Other websites == * Category:1961 drama movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Cypriot movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Cacoyannis
title: The Wastrel
